meta.title: On Method
meta.description: Defines how truth is observed, evaluated, and preserved as systems, narratives, and power structures change.

lines: It is observed, tested, and recorded.
This wiki exists to identify what stays true when everything else moves.

sections.title: Purpose
content: This project exists to preserve patterns that outlast authority, belief, and identity.
It is not concerned with winning arguments, shaping ideology, or establishing consensus.
Its function is archival: to keep track of what continues to hold when explanations fail and systems are stressed.
It is designed to remain useful when context shifts.

sections.title: What This Is
content: This is a wiki of laws, not doctrines.
A law is admitted only when it reappears across domains, remains observable without belief, holds under pressure, scale, and failure, and explains more than it predicts.
Nothing here asks for faith.
Everything here tolerates scrutiny.

sections.title: What This Is Not
content: This is not a religion.
This is not a manifesto.
This is not a community identity.
This is not a moral authority.
This is not a promise of certainty.
Certainty is treated as a signal for re-examination.

sections.title: On Authority
content: No voice is authoritative by default.
Names may appear for historical traceability.
Quotes may be preserved as artifacts, not endorsements.
No individual is elevated above the patterns they observed.
What matters is what endured, not who said it.

sections.title: On Contradiction
content: Contradictions are not removed.
They are documented.
When principles conflict, both are retained and their limits made explicit.
Reality is not required to be internally consistent.
Only accurately represented.

sections.title: On Simplicity
content: When multiple explanations exist, the simplest is preferred â€” until it fails.
Simplicity is a starting point, not a guarantee.
Complexity is not depth.
Obscurity is not wisdom.

sections.title: On Time
content: Time is treated as a filter, not a validator.
Ideas that survive repetition, misuse, and reinterpretation gain weight.
Ideas that require constant defense lose it.
Old laws are revisited regularly.
New laws are introduced cautiously.

sections.title: On Contribution
content: Anyone may contribute.
Contributions must clarify, not decorate.
Claims must be grounded in observation or documented recurrence.
Disagreement must be preserved when it exists.
The structure of the system must be respected.
This is a public record, not a personal canvas.

lines: This wiki does not seek to convince.
It exists so that when systems fail, beliefs collapse, or noise overwhelms signal, something stable remains to be consulted.
